message.body: Would it be okay with you if I invited Hannah Michelle to the PBK induction and told her which of us got it? It feels weird to me not to invite her. Also are you counting Elise as your guest in the RSVP?
Your text cut off. Can you resend?
I didn't get your text about hannah.

Would it be okay with you if I invited Hannah Michelle to the PBK induction and told her which of us got it? It feels weird to me not to invite her. Also are you counting Elise as your guest in the RSVP?
